#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
int T;
long long int num;
long long ans;
scanf("%d",&T);
while(T--)
{
scanf("%lld",&num);
if(num == 2)
 printf("15\n");
else
{
ans = pow(num,num+1LL);
ans = ans -num + 1LL;
printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
}
return 0;
}
